head_office_address: Flat No. L-52, Nivedita Kunj Sector 10, R.K.Puram
eu_initiatives: I follow the EU-U.K talks on Brexit so as to advise clients. I also follow the EU-India BTIA negotiations so as to advise industry associations in India. Finally, I have lately been following the EU's reactions to the imposition of tariffs by the US on steel and aluminium, so as to advise Indian steel companies.
relevant_communication: I have participated most recently on panel discussions on CNBC TV18, ET Now and Bloomberg Quint TV Channels of India on the implications of President Trump's announcements of raising tariffs on steel, aluminium and other products.
goals__remit: I am a self-employed consultant specialising in international trade issues.
